name: Builder Blitz Stack Pro
description:
Build stacked towers as high as you possibly can in this challenging casual stack game!

Builder Blitz Stack Pro features unique and challenging fun with wonderful HD graphics and a clean feel.

The game is exclusively designed to test your speed, focus, mind mapping, decision making and lot of other hidden skills. The game also tests your reflexes and puzzle skills. The game has multiple modes each with its own characteristics and features. The rules are simple; stack the building blocks in the right spot and build a city without causing it to fall over. Build the tower as high as you like, do not tap too fast or you might miss! The city is already full of skyscrapers! But can you build it, the highest skyscraper of this construction city!

How many Towers can you build, before the time runs out? An ultimate test of reflexes & speed!

How to Play:
- Tap to drop stacks in the right spot
- Time is limited so move fast but don't be clumsy
- Make the tower as high as you can and claim a high score

Game Features:
◉ Easy to Learn, Hard to Master.
◉ HD Graphic, Fun & Very Addicting
◉ Unique environments like rain and snow
◉ Difficult Challenges
◉ Simple Controls
◉ Refreshing Game-Play
◉ Low Memory Occupation
◉ Totally Free

Enjoy the game and go for the maximum high score. Download now!
